short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspect the CSS of any element by only hovering over it. Improve web dev and design experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CSScan is a simple CSS scanner.

How to use:
To enable CSScan, simply click the toolbar icon and then hover over any element you want to inspect on the current page. 

Privacy : 
CSScan requires permission to access website data. However, CSScan do not collect nor will ever transmit any of your private data. 

Known issues :
CSScan will not work in any opened tabs before installing it nor in the Google chrome store

We are constantly updating to add new features. Feel free to leave a comment if you have any questions.
